name: StayFocusd
summary: Owned by Sensor Tower. Shares identical codebase with StayFree. Embeds Pathmatics ad intelligence SDK with XHR/fetch hooking to scrape ads. Collects Gen-AI prompts/responses from ChatGPT, Gemini, DeepSeek, Perplexity, Copilot. Scrapes chatbot interactions from 30+ widgets. Uploads browsing data, page views, and URL query parameters to stayfocusd.st-panel-api.com.

vulnerabilities.title: XHR/Fetch Interception for Ad Intelligence Scraping
vulnerabilities.description: Pathmatics SDK hooks XHR and fetch to intercept all HTTP responses for ad creative harvesting from YouTube, Hulu, Netflix, TikTok, Twitter.

vulnerabilities.title: Gen-AI Conversation Collection
vulnerabilities.description: Scrapes AI conversations from ChatGPT, Gemini, DeepSeek, Perplexity, and Copilot. Uploads metadata and content to server.

vulnerabilities.title: Browsing Data Upload Pipeline
vulnerabilities.description: Uploads per-site session durations, page view counts, URL query parameters, and chatbot interaction data.

flags.description: Pathmatics SDK hooks XMLHttpRequest.prototype.send globally for ad response interception
window.fetch replaced to intercept all HTTP responses
Uploads browsing data, AI conversation data, chatbot conversations, and URL query parameters to stayfocusd.st-panel-api.com
Remote config system allows server-controlled behavior changes without extension update
